constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 111 (Friday, June 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TONKO:
H.R. 4192.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H3156]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

title: Erie Canalway National Heritage Corridor Commission Reauthorization Act
